column2: "Na Josua poon Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara hyiaa Sekem
column3: na ɔkɛfrɛɛ Israel mpanyimfo
column4: nye hɔn etsitsir
column6: nye hɔn ahwɛdofo no; na wokehyiae wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na Josua see ɔman no nyinara dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column5: Esu no n'egya na tsetseberdo no hom egyanom tsenae
column7: Abraham nye Nahor hɔn egya no: na wɔsoom enyame bi."

column2: "Na miyii hom egya Abraham fii Esu no n'egya na migyaa no faa Keenan asaase nyinara mu
column3: na memaa n'asefo dɔree
column4: na medze Isaak maa no."

column2: "Na medze Jakob nye Esau maa Isaak: na medze bepɔw Seir maa Esau
column3: dɛ ɔmfa; na Jakob nye ne mba no sianee kɔr Egypt."

column2: "Na mosomaa Moses nye Aaron
column3: na mehaaw Egypt
column4: dɛ mbrɛ dza meyɛe no wɔ mu no tse no: na n'ekyir no miyii hom puei."

column2: "Na miyii hom egyanom fii Egypt: na hom baa po no ho: na Egyptfo dze ntseaseanam
column3: na ɔnye mpɔnkɔdofo tsiiw hom egyanom baa Mbɛw Po no ho."

column2: "Na aber a wɔkekaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE no
column3: ɔdze sum hyɛɛ hom nye Egyptfo no ntamu
column4: na ɔdze po no baa hɔn do bɛkataa hɔn do; na hom enyiwa hun dza meyɛe no wɔ Egypt: na hom tsenaa sar no do nda pii."

column2: "Na medze hom baa Amorifo a wɔtse Jordan egya no asaase do; na wɔnye hom koe: na medze hɔn hyɛɛ hom nsa
column3: na hom faa hɔn asaase no fae; na mesɛɛ hɔn wɔ hom enyim."

column2: "Nna Zipor babanyin
column3: Moabhen no
column4: soɛree nye Israel koe: na ɔsomae ma wokehyiaa Beor babanyin Balaam dɛ ɔmbɛpaa hom:"

column2: "na mammpɛ dɛ mibetsie Balaam; dɛm ntsi nhyira ara na ohyiraa hom: nna miyii hom fii ne nsamu."
"Na hom twaa Jordan
column3: na wɔbaa Jeriko: na Jeriko mbarimba nye hom koe
column4: Amorifo
column10: nye Jebusfo; na miyii hɔn hyɛɛ hom nsa."

column2: "Na mosomaa nkotokrodo ma wodzii hom enyim
column3: ma wɔpaam hɔn fii hom enyim
column4: mekyerɛ Amorifo ahemfo beenu no; nnyɛ w'afona a

column2: "Na memaa hom asaase a hom annyɛ do edwuma
column3: nye nkurow a nnyɛ hom bi kyekyeree
column4: na hom tse mu; wenyin nture nye ngodua nture a ɔnnyɛ hom na hom tsetsɛwee naaso hom dzi yi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nsuro EWURADZE
column3: na hom nsom no turododo nye nokwar mu: na hom ntow enyame a hom egyanom somee wɔ Esu no n'egya
column4: nye Egypt no ngu; na hom nsom EWURADZE."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔyɛ hom enyi do dɛ omuo dɛ hom bɔsom EWURADZE a
column3: ɔno ndɛ da yi hom nsan mu nyi nyia hom bɔsom no; sɛ enyame a hom egyanom somee a wɔwɔ Esu no n'egya no o
column4: Amorifo a hom tse hɔn asaase do yi enyame o: na emi nye me fi dze

column2: "Na ɔman no buae na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Nyame mpa ngu dɛ yɛbɔpow EWURADZE
column4: akɔsom enyame bi;"

column2: "na EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn
column3: ɔnoara nye nyia oyii hɛn nye hɛn egyanom wɔ Egypt asaase do
column4: wɔ nkowaasom fi no mu
column5: na ɔyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse no wɔ hɛn enyim mu
column6: na ɔbɔɔ hɛn ho ban wɔ ɔkwan a yɛnam mu no nyinara mu
column7: nye aman a yetwaa mu wɔ hɔn mu no nyinara mu:"

column2: "na EWURADZE paam aman no nyinara wɔ hɛn enyim
column3: Amorifo a wɔtse asaase no do no mpo: dɛm ntsi hɛn so yɛbɔsom EWURADZE; na ɔno nye hɛn Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na Josua see ɔman no dɛ
column3: Oho
column4: Hom runntum nnsom EWURADZE; osiandɛ ɔyɛ Nyame krɔnkrɔn; ɔyɛ Nyame nyinkufo; ɔremmfa hom mbrato nye hom bɔn so nnkyɛ hom."

column2: "Sɛ hom pow EWURADZE
column3: na wɔsom enyame ananaben a
column4: ɔno ɔayɛ hom papa n'ekyir no

column2: "Na ɔman no see Josua dɛ
column3: Dabida; EWURADZE ara na yɛbɔsom no."

column2: "Na Josua see ɔman no dɛ
column3: Homara nye hom ho adasefo dɛ hom asan mu afa EWURADZE dɛ hom bɔsom no. Na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Yɛyɛ adasefo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: afei hom ntow enyame ananaben a wɔwɔ hom mu no ngu
column5: na hom ndan hom akoma mma EWURADZE

column2: "Na ɔman no see Josua dɛ
column3: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn na yɛbɔsom no
column4: na ne ndze na yebetsie."

column2: "Nna Josua nye ɔman no dzii ahyɛmu da no ara na ɔdze ahyɛdze nye mbra hyɛɛ hɔn wɔ Sekem."
"Na Josua kyerɛɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Nyankopɔn ne mbra nwoma no mu: na ɔfaa ɔbo kɛse
column3: na ɔdze sii hɔ wɔ esudur a osi EWURADZE no krɔnkrɔn bea no ho no ase."

column2: "Na Josua see ɔman no nyinara dɛ
column3: Wɔnhwɛ o
column4: ɔbo yi bɛyɛ hɛn ɔdasefo: osiandɛ ɔatse EWURADZE ne nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɛn no nyinara: dɛm ntsi ɔnyɛ hom ɔdasefo

column2: "Nna Josua gyaa ɔman no kwan
column3: ma nyimpa biara kɔr n'egyapadze ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ iyinom ekyir no
column3: Josua Nun ne babanyin no
column4: EWURADZE n'akowaa no
column6: nna oedzi mfe ɔha nye du."

column2: "Na wosiee no wɔ n'asaase he do wɔ Timnat-sera a ɔwɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow mu no wɔ bepɔw Gaas no kwaamu afamu."
"Na Israel soom EWURADZE Josua ne nda nyinara
column3: nye mpanyimfo a Josua wui gyaa hɔn
column4: na wohun EWURADZE n'edwuma nyinara a ɔyɛe maa Israel no

column2: "Na Josef mbiew a Israelmba dze fi Egypt bae no wosiee no wɔ Sekem
column3: wɔ asaasetɔw a Jakob tɔɔ no wɔ Sekem n'egya Hamor ne mbabanyin no hɔ maa ndwetɛbona ɔha no mu: na ɔbɛyɛɛ Josefmba no egyapadze."

column2: "Na Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar wui; na wosiee no wɔ ne babanyin Finehas koko a wɔdze maa no wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow mu no do."
